name: Air Fryer Salt and Vinegar Pumpkin Seeds
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: I've experimented with many different flavors, but these are my all-time favorite. Three ingredients and a little bit of patience is all you need to whip up this crispy, addictive snack. This is a must for all of you salt and vinegar lovers out there.
ingredients: 1 cup raw pumpkin seeds, rinsed and dried
directions: Place pumpkin seeds in a bowl
Pour vinegar over the top and let soak for at least 1 hour
Drain off vinegar and stir in salt
Preheat an air fryer to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Place seeds in the basket and cook for 30 minutes, shaking the basket every 10 minutes
Transfer seeds to a paper towel lined plate and let sit for 5 minutes
